Class ChatFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ChatFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The frame used by the ChatClient to visualize it's data.
    Author:
    Whirvis "MarfGamer" Ardenaur
    See Also:
